name: Argon Assault (Zirk Coetsee)
description:
Rail Shooter, fly through the sky, boost to catch up and shoot down enemy space ships.

Gameplay:

  • UP: W/UP ARROWS
  • Down: S/DOWN ARROW
  • Left: A/LEFT ARROW
  • Right: D/RIGHT ARROW
  • Boost: LEFT SHIFT /RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
  • Fire Lasers: LEFT SHIFT /LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Credits:

  • Music by: Space Threat (Free action Music)  by Muz Station Productions
  • Menu: Menu inspired by SpeedTutor tutorial on youtube
  • Path function for rail:  Inspired by 
    Sebastian Lague on youtube
  • Project tutorial adapted from: Project Argon Assault in Beginner Unity 3D Creator Course by Gamedev.tv

To play extract the zip file and run the exe.
